price: 38. Et les ‘Ad, les Thamûd, les habitants d’Ar-Rass, et plusieurs générations intermédiaires !
arabic: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونَۢا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waʿādan wathamūdā wa-aṣḥāba al-rasi waqurūnan bayna dhālika kathīran
